__e: If I had such a face, I would never go into a convent.

- l killed something in a convent last night.
I know we sat together in the Cloisters and she told me something very important, but I have no idea what she said.
It was a gift to the convent and I defy you to take it away from me.
He has found a good home for my baby, the Abbey of Kirklees.

Well, I think he'd be too scared to leave the monastery.
Oh, please, I'm getting married. I'm not joining a convent!

Wait for me in the forest behind the convent.
